item.title: Performance Insights
item.author: simbatango@gmail.com (Simba)
item.description: As I was uploading a couple of new videos at youtube, I noticed the ‘Attention’ ranking of my videos in the ‘Insights’ section. The video with most attention (showed by a red bar like in the illustration top centre) is a video showing Jorge Dispari and María ‘La Turca’ del Carmen at Confitería Ideal. At the time of writing, this video has been viewed 11 852 times. Youtube describes the calculation of the video ‘hot spots’ like this: ”The ups-and-downs of viewership at each moment in your video, compared to videos of similar length.
